item.description:
Northeastern University is hosting events for the first Global Entrepreneurship Week.

http://www.eweek.neu....

There are no registration fees and all workshops, panels, and special events are FREE and OPEN to everyone.

There are events for the first-time entrepreneur looking to start their first business, or for the serial entrepreneur looking to go global.

Come and quench your desire to commercialize your ideas and achieve your dreams!

full calender : http://www.eweek.neu....

Events
Opening Ceremony
11/17 - Entrepreneurship Week Kick-Off Event


Workshops
11/17 - Global Enterprise
11/17 - Negotiating to Yes!
11/19 - Entrepreneurship and the Family Business
11/19 - The Five Must-Do Steps to Starting Your Own Business
11/20 - The Art and Science of Raising Money
11/20 - Social Entrepreneurship – Entrepreneurship in an Emerging Economy Context


Panels
11/17 - Engineering Success in Business: Engineering majors to business leaders
11/18 - Creative Industries and the Global Economy
11/19 - Entrepreneurship in the International Community
11/20 - Health Sciences - The Reluctant Entrepreneur Breakfast and Panel
11/20 - Entrepreneurship in the Music Industry - A Panel Discussion
11/20 - Find Your Niche: Entrepreneurship in the Health Sciences
11/20 - EntreTech Forum: The Youth Movement – Digital Media's Leaders and their Ideas


Special Events
11/18 - Music Entrepreneurship Business Plan Forum
11/18 - ONEin3 Boston Young Entrepreneurs and EO Accelerator
11/18 - EO Boston - Overcoming Adversity in Business and in Life
11/19 - Invention to Venture


Global Partners
11/19 - Female Students Entrepreneurship Networking Event at Waseda University
11/20 - Official Opening, Waseda University Incubation Center
11/21 – Waseda University Business Plan Forum and Networking
item.name: GLOBAL ENTREPRENEURSHIP WEEK Nov.17-23 - NORTHEASTERN U.
